title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NoneOverview of GIS; Database and Spatial concepts related to GIS; Representation and Algorithms; GIS data formats and Standards; Planning and Implementing a GIS; Application of GIS; Case studies on GIS; GIS technology trend and Next generation systems; GIS and Remote Sensing; GIS and GPS.
